text: Air Force is a 1943 American World War II action movie directed by Howard Hawks and starring John Garfield, John Ridgely, Gig Young, Arthur Kennedy, Harry Carey, George Tobias, Ward Wood. It was distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures and was nominated for 4 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1944. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1943 war movies Category:1940s action movies Category:American war movies Category:American action movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Howard Hawks Category:Movies set in Florida Category:Movies set in the Philippines Category:Movies about air forces
title: Air Force (movie)
